summary: SummaryLancôme's Définicils Defining and Lengthening Mascara is an iconic defining mascara that creates the look of longer lashes with a flake-free, non-clumping formula. This lengthening mascara defines lashes using polymers formulated to lift and lengthen.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers long, defined, and natural-looking eyelashesClean and precise applicationEffective lengthening mascara that separates lashes without clumping, making them appear naturally striking from root-to-tipFor sensitive eyes, mascara can be challenging and this formula includes panthenol and vitamin B5 to conditionItem 2235633How To UsePrep lashes with Cils Booster XL.Comb through lashes with brush in a smooth vertical motion, while Cils Booster XL is still wet.Apply to eyelashes in gradual layers for major lash lift and the appearance of longer lashes.To remove, Lancôme recommends Bi-Facil Double Action Eye-Makeup Remover, a bi-phase makeup remover that gently whisks away all types of makeup, including waterproof makeup, to leave the eye area perfectly clean and fresh.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prep lashes with Cils Booster XL.Comb through lashes with brush in a smooth vertical motion, while Cils Booster XL is still wet.Apply to eyelashes in gradual layers for major lash lift and the appearance of longer lashes.To remove, Lancôme recommends Bi-Facil Double Action Eye-Makeup Remover, a bi-phase makeup remover that gently whisks away all types of makeup, including waterproof makeup, to leave the eye area perfectly clean and fresh.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: At my age, I have thin lashes. I love this mascara and the brush. No problem with smearing. I've been using for years.

reviews.headline: Rep
reviews.comments: The mascara lengthens as it claims and does no damage.

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: Wish I could give no stars. It's so expensive and I received it dried out.

reviews.headline: YES!
reviews.comments: Lancome is great. Ulta is fabulous. I had a great experience!

reviews.headline: Lovey
reviews.comments: Great mascara.  Separates & covers lashes thoroughly.

reviews.headline: So disappointed
reviews.comments: I just KNEW I would love this mascara but I hate it. It made my lashes look like thin little twigs, and forget about applying more. it dried super quickly and started flaking whenever I tried to work with it. Unfortunately I didn't keep the box so now I don't think I can return it.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: Just what I was looking for!

reviews.headline: Best mascara for me
reviews.comments: I have tried many mascaras and this is the best

reviews.headline: Great defining and lengthening mascara
reviews.comments: Have used this mascara for years. Great defining and lengthening mascara and it doesn't clump up.

reviews.headline: Tried and true
reviews.comments: This is the only mascara I've found that doesn't smear underneath the eye, and it doesn't clump. It's pretty expensive, so I try to purchase when on sale.

reviews.headline: Clumps and doesn't build nicely
reviews.comments: I was surprised to find this mascara clumps the way it does. It also doesnt build so it takes a lot of effort to put it on. My tried-and-true pink Maybelline Grrat Lash goes on much nicer!

reviews.headline: Best Mascara
reviews.comments: This is the best mascara!! It goes on easily, giving my lashes length and stays on all day!

reviews.headline: Best Mascara Out There
reviews.comments: I've been using this for at least a decade. It defines, lengthens very well and is buildable if you want more drama. I can load 3 coats on and it looks great. Doesn't smudge or cause raccoon eyes. Once in a while I'll notice a little flake but that's it.

reviews.headline: I've bought this mascara on repeat!
reviews.comments: I keep going back to purchasing this mascara as I love it so much! I've purchased in both the black and dark brown color and love them both! It is perfect for lengthening my lashes without looking cakey or too thick. I like volume in my lashes but I prefer that they look long and defined - which this mascara provides both. It is perfect for everyday where and comes off nicely with an oil-based cleanser. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Do not like
reviews.comments: I actually hate this mascara. I wanted something that thickens and lengthen my lashes, but this mascara is barely noticeable. I have to add a few coats of this to do to look noticeable at all. And because of the way the wand is I end up getting it all over my eyelids as well. Will not buy again..

reviews.headline: New favorite
reviews.comments: A friend recommended I try this mascara and I'm so glad he did. Simply love it and love the look. Separates and lengthens beautifully. Highly recommend

reviews.headline: Great mascara
reviews.comments: I've used this mascara for over 30 years. It separates your lashes well. I highly recommend it for younger girls as their first really good mascara. My entire family wears this mascara.

reviews.headline: Stocking Stuffer
reviews.comments: My daughters favorite.

reviews.headline: Best Mascara
reviews.comments: This is my favorite mascara that I have used. It  makes my lashes so long and not clumpy at all.

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: There are definitely more affordable mascaras which do the job way better than this one. And for less! Disappointing!

media.headline: Best Mascara EVER!
media.caption: Happy Defincils Mascara Grandma // Love Lancome Products

media.headline: By far better than any drugstore brand ... duh
media.caption: this mascara < 3 the best ive ever had ;)

faceoff_positive.comments: This is the best mascara hands down. I am on my 5th tube and will never stop using it! I have dry lashes and this mascara seems to condition and hydrate them. It never clumps or flakes. It lengthens, adds volume, and separates lashes. The brush is also the perfect size and the formula has a great consistency. I have sensitive eyes and this does not irritate them. Thank you Lancome for making such an excellent product.
faceoff_positive.headline: BEST Mascara on Earth

faceoff_negative.comments: I found this mascara to be too wet for my lashes. I have very straight hard to curl lashes that are fairly short. This mascara had a nice dark black color but after curling and applying my lashes immediately went straight. I don't recall this mascara smudging throughout the day so that's one nice thing. I received this as a sample but I would not buy it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not impressed
